titleStmt.title: Judgment brought forth unto victory, and mercy kissing j[udgm]ent being t[he] work and mercy of God (upon my soul) which conduceth to his praise : also a tender invitation of love unto the professors and to the prophane, to come unto Christ that they may have life / written in the fear of the Lord, and as moved by his Holy Spirit through his servant, Francis Lea.
titleStmt.author: Lea, Francis.

titleStmt.title: Judgment brought forth unto victory, and mercy kissing j[udgm]ent being t[he] work and mercy of God (upon my soul) which conduceth to his praise : also a tender invitation of love unto the professors and to the prophane, to come unto Christ that they may have life / written in the fear of the Lord, and as moved by his Holy Spirit through his servant, Francis Lea.
titleStmt.author: Lea, Francis.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.)
Imperfect: stained and defaced, p. 31 repaired; best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
